text: @PGIMER Specialists: Preventive Health Care Gets Pgimer Specialists’ Backing👏🏻👨‍⚕️👩‍⚕️ Great initiative by PGIMER specialists to engage with the public on preventive health care! 💡 Educating patients in peripheral areas about disease prevention and timely medical care can improve health outcomes and alleviate financial strain. 💰🏥 Bravo, PGI director Prof Vivek Lal, for emphasizing the importance of this educational outreach! 👏🏻The department of nephrology leading the way by sending doctors to rural centres is fantastic! 🌳 A monthly roster and awareness talks will help patients feel at ease while interacting with the doctors. 😊 Kudos, Dr Raja Ramachandran, for your efforts! 👏🏻Let's work together to prioritize preventive health care and make a positive impact on our communities! 💪🏽🌈
